verses.verse: וּֽלְנָעֳמִ֞י <WH5281> u-le-no-'o-Mi And Naomi; מְיֻדָּע me-yud-da' כמֹודַ֣ע <WH3045> mo-Da' acknowledge קלְאִישָׁ֗הּ <WH376> le-'i-Shah, of her husband's אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> 'ish man גִּבּ֣וֹר <WH1368> gib-Bor a mighty חַ֔יִל <WH2428> Cha-yil, of wealth מִמִּשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> mi-mish-Pa-chat of the family אֱלִימֶ֑לֶךְ <WH458> 'e-li-Me-lech; of Elimelech וּשְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> u-she-Mo and his name בֹּֽעַז׃ <WH1162> Bo-'az. [was] Boaz

וַתֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> vat-to-Mer said ר֨וּת <WH7327> rut And Ruth הַמּוֹאֲבִיָּ֜ה <WH4125> ham-mo-'a-vi-Yah the Moabitess אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to נָעֳמִ֗י <WH5281> no-'o-Mi, unto Naomi אֵֽלְכָה־ <WH1980> 'e-le-chah- go נָּ֤א <WH4994> na Please הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> has-sa-Deh to the field וַאֲלַקֳטָ֣ה <WH3950> va-'a-la-ko-Tah and glean בַשִּׁבֳּלִ֔ים <WH7641> vash-shib-bo-Lim, ears of corn אַחַ֕ר <WH310> 'a-Char after אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whose אֶמְצָא־ <WH4672> 'em-tza- I shall find חֵ֖ן <WH2580> chen grace בְּעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> be-'ei-Nav; [him] in whose sight וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vat-To-mer And she said לָ֖הּ lah לְכִ֥י <WH1980> le-Chi to her Go בִתִּֽי׃ <WH1323> vit-Ti. my daughter

וַתֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> vat-Te-lech departed וַתָּבוֹא֙ <WH935> vat-ta-Vo and came וַתְּלַקֵּ֣ט <WH3950> vat-te-lak-Ket and gleaned בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> bas-sa-Deh, in the field אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after הַקֹּצְרִ֑ים <WH7114> hak-ko-tze-Rim; the reapers וַיִּ֣קֶר <WH7136> vai-Yi-ker was to light מִקְרֶ֔הָ <WH4745> mik-Re-ha, and her hap חֶלְקַ֤ת <WH2513> chel-Kat on a part הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> has-sa-Deh of the field לְבֹ֔עַז <WH1162> le-Vo-'az, [belonging] unto Boaz אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who מִמִּשְׁפַּ֥חַת <WH4940> mi-mish-Pa-chat who [was] of the kindred אֱלִימֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH458> 'e-li-Me-lech. of Elimelech

וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> ve-hin-neh- now behold בֹ֗עַז <WH1162> Vo-'az, And behold Boaz בָּ֚א <WH935> ba came מִבֵּ֣ית mib-Beit לֶ֔חֶם <WH1035> Le-chem, from Bethlehem וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said לַקּוֹצְרִ֖ים <WH7114> lak-kotz-Rim unto the reapers יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD עִמָּכֶ֑ם <WH5973> 'im-ma-Chem; and they וַיֹּ֥אמְרוּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-ru [be] with you And they answered ל֖וֹ lo יְבָרֶכְךָ֥ <WH1288> ye-va-rech-Cha bless יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. him The LORD

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer Then said בֹּ֙עַז֙ <WH1162> bo-'az Boaz לְנַעֲר֔וֹ <WH5288> le-na-'a-Ro, unto his servant הַנִּצָּ֖ב <WH5324> han-nitz-Tzav that was set עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- of הַקּֽוֹצְרִ֑ים <WH7114> hak-kotz-Rim; over the reapers לְמִ֖י <WH4310> le-Mi Whose הַנַּעֲרָ֥ה <WH5291> han-na-'a-Rah Whose damsel הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> haz-Zot. likewise

וַיַּ֗עַן <WH6030> vai-Ya-'an, answered הַנַּ֛עַר <WH5288> han-Na-'ar And the servant הַנִּצָּ֥ב <WH5324> han-nitz-Tzav that was set עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- of הַקּוֹצְרִ֖ים <WH7114> hak-kotz-Rim over the reapers וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> vai-yo-Mar; and said נַעֲרָ֤ה <WH5291> na-'a-Rah damsel מֽוֹאֲבִיָּה֙ <WH4125> mo-'a-vi-Yah It [is] the Moabitish הִ֔יא <WH1931> Hi, who הַשָּׁ֥בָה <WH7725> hash-Sha-vah that came back עִֽם־ <WH5973> 'im- with נָעֳמִ֖י <WH5281> no-'o-Mi with Naomi מִשְּׂדֵ֥ה <WH7704> mis-se-Deh out of the country מוֹאָֽב׃ <WH4124> mo-'Av. of Moab

וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vat-To-mer, And she said אֲלַקֳטָה־ <WH3950> 'a-la-ko-tah- I pray you let me glean נָּא֙ <WH4994> na Please וְאָסַפְתִּ֣י <WH622> ve-'a-saf-Ti and gather בָֽעֳמָרִ֔ים <WH6016> vo-'o-ma-Rim, among the sheaves אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after הַקּוֹצְרִ֑ים <WH7114> hak-kotz-Rim; the reapers וַתָּב֣וֹא <WH935> vat-ta-Vo so she came וַֽתַּעֲמ֗וֹד <WH5975> vat-ta-'a-Mod, and hath continued מֵאָ֤ז <WH227> me-'Az even הַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> hab-Bo-ker from the morning וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- until עַ֔תָּה <WH6258> 'At-tah, now זֶ֛ה <WH2088> zeh she שִׁבְתָּ֥הּ <WH3427> shiv-Tah until now that she tarried הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit in the house מְעָֽט׃ <WH4592> me-'At. a little

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> vai-yo-Mer Then said בֹּ֨עַז <WH1162> Bo-'az Boaz אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to ר֜וּת <WH7327> rut unto Ruth הֲל֧וֹא <WH3808> ha-Lo carefully שָׁמַ֣עַתְּ <WH8085> sha-Ma-'at Hearest בִּתִּ֗י <WH1323> bit-Ti, my daughter אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תֵּלְכִי֙ <WH1980> te-le-Chi go לִלְקֹט֙ <WH3950> lil-Kot not to glean בְּשָׂדֶ֣ה <WH7704> be-sa-Deh field אַחֵ֔ר <WH312> 'a-Cher, in another וְגַ֛ם <WH1571> ve-Gam furthermore לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo carefully תַעֲבוּרִ֖י <WH5674> ta-'a-vu-Ri neither go מִזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> miz-Zeh; this וְכֹ֥ה <WH3541> ve-Choh here תִדְבָּקִ֖ין <WH1692> tid-ba-Kin from hence but abide עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with נַעֲרֹתָֽי׃ <WH5291> na-'a-ro-Tai. here fast by my maidens

עֵינַ֜יִךְ <WH5869> 'ei-Na-yich [Let] thine eyes בַּשָּׂדֶ֤ה <WH7704> bas-sa-Deh [be] on the field אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which יִקְצֹרוּן֙ <WH7114> yik-tzo-Run that they do reap וְהָלַ֣כְתְּ <WH1980> ve-ha-Lacht and go אַחֲרֵיהֶ֔ן <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Hen, thou after הֲל֥וֹא <WH3808> ha-Lo Indeed צִוִּ֛יתִי <WH6680> tziv-Vi-ti them have I not charged אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַנְּעָרִ֖ים <WH5288> han-ne-'a-Rim the young men לְבִלְתִּ֣י <WH1115> le-vil-Ti not נָגְעֵ֑ךְ <WH5060> na-ge-'Ech; that they shall not touch וְצָמִ֗ת <WH6770> ve-tza-Mit, thee;and when thou art athirst וְהָלַכְתְּ֙ <WH1980> ve-ha-lachT go אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הַכֵּלִ֔ים <WH3627> hak-ke-Lim, unto the vessels וְשָׁתִ֕ית <WH8354> ve-sha-Tit and drink מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> me-'a-Sher what יִשְׁאֲב֖וּן <WH7579> yish-'a-Vun have drawn הַנְּעָרִֽים׃ <WH5288> han-ne-'a-Rim. of [that] which the young men

וַתִּפֹּל֙ <WH5307> vat-tip-Pol Then she fell עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on פָּנֶ֔יהָ <WH6440> pa-Nei-ha, on her face וַתִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <WH7812> vat-tish-Ta-chu and bowed אָ֑רְצָה <WH776> 'A-re-tzah; herself to the ground וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vat-To-mer and said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, to him מַדּוּעַ֩ <WH4069> mad-du-a' Why מָצָ֨אתִי <WH4672> ma-Tza-ti unto him Why have I found חֵ֤ן <WH2580> chen grace בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei-cha in thine eyes לְהַכִּירֵ֔נִי <WH5234> le-hak-ki-Re-ni, that thou shouldest take knowledge וְאָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> ve-'a-no-Chi I נָכְרִיָּֽה׃ <WH5237> na-che-ri-Yah. alien

וַיַּ֤עַן <WH6030> vai-Ya-'an answered בֹּ֙עַז֙ <WH1162> bo-'az And Boaz וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said לָ֔הּ Lah, הֻגֵּ֨ד <WH5046> hug-Ged unto her It hath fully הֻגַּ֜ד <WH5046> hug-Gad been shewed לִ֗י Li, כֹּ֤ל <WH3605> kol to her All אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- you עָשִׂית֙ <WH6213> 'a-Sit me all that thou hast done אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- for חֲמוֹתֵ֔ךְ <WH2545> cha-mo-Tech, unto thy mother in law אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei since מ֣וֹת <WH4194> Mot the death אִישֵׁ֑ךְ <WH376> 'i-Shech; of thine husband וַתַּֽעַזְבִ֞י <WH5800> vat-ta-'az-Vi and [how] thou hast left אָבִ֣יךְ <WH1> 'a-Vich thy father וְאִמֵּ֗ךְ <WH517> ve-'im-Mech, and thy mother וְאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> ve-'E-retz and the land מֽוֹלַדְתֵּ֔ךְ <WH4138> mo-lad-Tech, of thy nativity וַתֵּ֣לְכִ֔י <WH1980> vat-Te-le-Chi, and came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to עַ֕ם <WH5971> 'am unto a people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not יָדַ֖עַתְּ <WH3045> ya-Da-'at which thou knewest תְּמ֥וֹל <WH8543> te-Mol before שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <WH8032> shil-Shom. before that time

יְשַׁלֵּ֥ם <WH7999> ye-shal-Lem recompense יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD פָּעֳלֵ֑ךְ <WH6467> po-'o-Lech; thy work וּתְהִ֨י <WH1961> u-te-Hi become מַשְׂכֻּרְתֵּ֜ךְ <WH4909> mas-kur-Tech reward שְׁלֵמָ֗ה <WH8003> she-le-Mah, and a full מֵעִ֤ם <WH5973> me-'Im from יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh be given thee of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whose בָּ֖את <WH935> bat thou art come לַחֲס֥וֹת <WH2620> la-cha-Sot to trust תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> ta-chat- under כְּנָפָֽיו׃ <WH3671> ke-na-Fav. under whose wings

וַ֠תֹּאמֶר <WH559> Vat-to-mer Then she said אֶמְצָא־ <WH4672> 'em-tza- Let me find חֵ֨ן <WH2580> chen favour בְּעֵינֶ֤יךָ <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei-cha in thy sight אֲדֹנִי֙ <WH113> 'a-do-Ni my lord כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki and indeed נִֽחַמְתָּ֔נִי <WH5162> ni-cham-Ta-ni, for that thou hast comforted וְכִ֥י <WH3588> ve-Chi and indeed דִבַּ֖רְתָּ <WH1696> dib-Bar-ta me and for that thou hast spoken עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and לֵ֣ב <WH3820> lev friendly שִׁפְחָתֶ֑ךָ <WH8198> shif-cha-Te-cha; unto thine handmaid וְאָנֹכִי֙ <WH595> ve-'a-no-Chi I לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not אֶֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> 'eh-Yeh, I am כְּאַחַ֖ת <WH259> ke-'a-Chat though I be not like unto one שִׁפְחֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH8198> shif-cho-Tei-cha. of thine handmaidens

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> vai-yo-Mer said לָ֨ה lah בֹ֜עַז <WH1162> Vo-'az And Boaz לְעֵ֣ת <WH6256> le-'Et after הָאֹ֗כֶל <WH400> ha-'O-chel, eating גֹּ֤שִֽׁי <WH5066> Go-shi come הֲלֹם֙ <WH1988> ha-Lom thou hither וְאָכַ֣לְתְּ <WH398> ve-'a-Chalt and eat מִן־ <WH4480> min- at הַלֶּ֔חֶם <WH3899> hal-Le-chem, of the bread וְטָבַ֥לְתְּ <WH2881> ve-ta-Valt and dip פִּתֵּ֖ךְ <WH6595> pit-Tech thy morsel בַּחֹ֑מֶץ <WH2558> ba-Cho-metz; in the vinegar וַתֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <WH3427> vat-Te-shev And she sat מִצַּ֣ד <WH6654> mitz-Tzad beside הַקּֽוֹצְרִ֔ים <WH7114> hak-kotz-Rim, the reapers וַיִּצְבָּט־ <WH6642> vai-yitz-bot- and he reached לָ֣הּ lah קָלִ֔י <WH7039> ka-Li, her parched וַתֹּ֥אכַל <WH398> vat-To-chal [corn] and she did eat וַתִּשְׂבַּ֖ע <WH7646> vat-tis-Ba' and was sufficed וַתֹּתַֽר׃ <WH3498> vat-to-Tar. and left

וַתָּ֖קָם <WH6965> vat-Ta-kom And when she was risen up לְלַקֵּ֑ט <WH3950> le-lak-Ket; to glean וַיְצַו֩ <WH6680> vay-Tzav commanded בֹּ֨עַז <WH1162> Bo-'az Boaz אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נְעָרָ֜יו <WH5288> ne-'a-Rav his young men לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying גַּ֣ם <WH1571> gam even בֵּ֧ין <WH996> bein among הָֽעֳמָרִ֛ים <WH6016> ho-'o-ma-Rim even among the sheaves תְּלַקֵּ֖ט <WH3950> te-lak-Ket Let her glean וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo not תַכְלִימֽוּהָ׃ <WH3637> tach-li-Mu-ha. and reproach

וְגַ֛ם <WH1571> ve-Gam Also שֹׁל־ <WH7997> shol- And let fall תָּשֹׁ֥לּוּ <WH7997> ta-Shol-lu of purpose לָ֖הּ lah מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַצְּבָתִ֑ים <WH6653> hatz-tze-va-Tim; also [some] of the handfuls וַעֲזַבְתֶּ֥ם <WH5800> va-'a-zav-Tem for her and leave וְלִקְּטָ֖ה <WH3950> ve-lik-ke-Tah [them] that she may glean וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo not תִגְעֲרוּ־ <WH1605> tig-'a-ru- [them] and rebuke בָֽהּ׃ Vah.

וַתְּלַקֵּ֥ט <WH3950> vat-te-lak-Ket So she gleaned בַּשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> bas-sa-Deh in the field עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until הָעָ֑רֶב <WH6153> ha-'A-rev; until even וַתַּחְבֹּט֙ <WH2251> vat-tach-Bot and beat out אֵ֣ת <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- what לִקֵּ֔טָה <WH3950> lik-Ke-tah, that she had gleaned וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> vay-Hi become כְּאֵיפָ֥ה <WH374> ke-'ei-Fah and it was about an ephah שְׂעֹרִֽים׃ <WH8184> se-'o-Rim. of barley

וַתִּשָּׂא֙ <WH5375> vat-tis-Sa And she took [it] up וַתָּב֣וֹא <WH935> vat-ta-Vo and went הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir, into the city וַתֵּ֥רֶא <WH7200> vat-Te-re saw חֲמוֹתָ֖הּ <WH2545> cha-mo-Tah and her mother in law אֵ֣ת <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- what לִקֵּ֑טָה <WH3950> lik-Ke-tah; what she had gleaned וַתּוֹצֵא֙ <WH3318> vat-to-Tze and she brought forth וַתִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> vat-tit-ten- and gave לָ֔הּ Lah, אֵ֥ת <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- what הוֹתִ֖רָה <WH3498> ho-Ti-rah to her that she had reserved מִשָּׂבְעָֽהּ׃ <WH7648> mis-sa-ve-'Ah. after she was sufficed
